body:
> Then why is it that a mans value goes completely out the window depending on whether or not he's a virgin?

Because nature is unfair and has determined that the male's absolute only function is to make the female's life and give her his seed. This is also why most men can't tolerate having no partner but women are perfectly fine being alone (actually it's nearly impossible for a man to be happy in general, due to aggression being prioritized and being forced to endure stressful work and sometimes risky situations and wars constantly), and why we are primally hardwired to have sympathy for women but not men. Female = normal, male = modified and expendable version made specifically to help the female and give her a way to reproduce. This also affects social stigma, that is pretty much anything is acceptable for women but men are scrutinized if they don't fit an extremely narrow male archetype, which of course includes being a virgin. Of course women sacrifice most their body for the uterus and have to deal with more pain (though they're also tougher with it, regardless of how dramatic they act). But I think men definitely get the rough end of the deal here, and unfortunately it doesn't look like our biology is going to change this any time soon.
